attributes.review:
Very glitchy. Shuts down when I try to do anything. Does not listen to me. Doesn’t seem very informed. Promotes bigotry.

attributes.title: Absolutely Terrible

attributes.review: this app is extremely horrible. attributes.review: I think this app gave my phone a STI. Don’t download, it will infect your phone. And it also randomly made everything orange... if I could give it zero stars, I would.
attributes.title: Waste of iPhone storage space

attributes.review: As soon as I opened the app I was presented with a filmed staged reading of “Cats” the musical. Very strange as I was expecting this app would provide coupons for Cheetos and tutorials on how to hold glasses of water and walk down swippewy wamps. Honestly disappointed.
attributes.title: Disappointed

attributes.review: Not a good app truly disappointed I thought if I could be better but I’m truly disappointed in what this app has showed
attributes.title: Disappointed and they should delete this app

attributes.review: I downloaded this app in hopes of keeping up with trump but after I downloaded it all my photos were gone! Don’t download or your pictures will be lost!
attributes.title: Horrible

attributes.review: This app was gross I saw a weird mutated orange thing right when I opened the app then I saw that that he was trying to destroy America like ahhhh the monster was going to attack why would people let a mutant Orange take over USA omg he is right in my room ahh bann this app ahhhhhhhh hel.......😵☠️

This app promised it would MaKe AmEriCa GrEaT aGaiN but it made Amerikkka so much WORSE. Do not download. My phone has never had so many issues!!! This app is clearly only designed for people with tiny hands and toddler level IQs.
attributes.title: DOES NOT WORK

attributes.review: this app sent me to the mental hospital for bleaching my eyes. i can no longer see AND i have a $7,000 medical fee. i’d also like some compensation for having to see this man before i blinded myself. thank you :)
attributes.title: no thank you ma’am 😌🤚🏼

attributes.review: This app is so horrible. When you download it they come into your house and beat up all of your kids!! In all seriousness though, this app data mines so if you thought tik tok was bad imagine an old Cheeto stealing your info.
attributes.title: DONT DOWNLOAD
